title: Pset_ActuatorTypeRotationalActuation
description:
Characteristics of rotational actuation of an actuator
History: Replaces Pset_RotationalActuator

Torque.title: Torque
Torque.description: Indicates the maximum close-off torque for the actuator.

RangeAngle.title: RangeAngle
RangeAngle.description: Indicates the maximum rotation the actuator must traverse.
